post.summary: Get Quote to Transfer between multicurrency wallets.

sender.description: ID of Multicurrency Account. Leave blank to transfer from parent.

amountToSend.description: Amount in originCurrency currency to transfer/swap.

originCurrency.description: ISO Currency String like CAD, USD etc of the wallet to transfer from

receiver.description: Valid Chimoney Multi-currency Account, User or Organization ID.

email.description: Send transfer to an email. Ignored if receiver is valid

phoneNumber.description: Send transfer to an phone number. Ignored if receiver or email is valid

destinationCurrency.description: ISO Currency String like CAD, USD etc of the wallet to transfer to

error.example: sender must be a valid Chimoney user ID
